) 
 

Compute the vat, the fiche.f_id are in a_fiche the quantity in a_quant.

$a_fiche fiche id array

$ap_vat Array of tva id

Returns:

00872   $and="";

00874   if ( isset ($get) ) {
00875     foreach ($get as $name=>$value ) {
00876       // we clean the parameter offset, step, page and size
00877       if (  ! in_array($name,array('offset','step','page','size'))) {
00878         $url.=$and.$name."=".$value;
00879         $and="&";
00880       }// if
00881     }//foreach
00882   }// if
00883   // compute max of page
00884   $nb_page=($p_line-($p_line%$p_size))/$p_size;
00885   echo_debug('user_common',__LINE__,"nb_page = $nb_page");
00886   // if something remains
00887   if ( $p_line % $p_size != 0 ) $nb_page+=1;
00888 
00889   // if max page == 1 then return a empty string
00890   if ( $nb_page == 1) return "";

00898

00900     $r.="Pr&eacute;c&eacute;dent";
00901     $r.="</A>&nbsp;&nbsp;";
00902   }
00903 
00904   // Create the bar
00905   for ($e=1;$e<=$nb_page;$e++) {
00906     // do not included current page
00907     if ( $e != $p_page ) {
00908     $step=$_SESSION['g_pagesize'];
00909     $offset=($e-1)*$step;
00910     $go=sprintf($_SERVER['PHP_SELF']."?".$url."&offset=$offset&step=$step&page=$e&size=$step");
00911     $r.=sprintf('<A class="mtitle" HREF="%s" CLASS="one">%d</A>&nbsp;',$go,$e);
00912     } else {
00913       $r.="<b> $e </b>";
00914     } //else
00915     // add a break if e > 80
00916     if ( $e % 57 == 0 ) {
00917       $r.="<br>";
00918     }
00919   } //for
00920   // next
00921   if ($p_page !=$nb_page) {
00922     $e=$p_page+1;
00923     $step=$_SESSION['g_pagesize'];
00924     $offset=($e-1)*$step;
00925 
00926     $r.='&nbsp;<A class="mtitle" href="'.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF']."?".$url."&offset=$offset&step=$step&page=$e&size=$step".'">';
00927     $r.="Suivant";
00928     $r.="</A>";
00929   }
00930 
00931 
00932   return $r;
00933 }
